title: LEASE TODAY AND RECIEVE 8 WEEKS FREE-MONTROSE
posting_body: For leasing info call or text
Welcome to This beautiful community - where elegant residences meet unparalleled amenities within the vibrant Regent Square district at the heart of Houston.
Experience an elevated way of life, with world-class restaurant and retail anchored by James Beard award-winning chefs and lush tree-lined sidewalks and lawns.
Designed to endlessly inspire, exhilarate, and motivate, This community welcomes you to experience a comprehensive lifestyle embodying the best of cosmopolitan living.
